description: This table contains information about your bereaved records. These include name, address, phone numbers, and associated patients. The records included in this table are Bereavement Contact (LHB) records.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the bereavement contact record.

columns.name: RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the bereavement contact record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record status, such as active or soft-deleted.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: BEREAVE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status of the bereavement contact.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Pre-death


Active


Resolved


Deleted

columns.name: BEREAVEMENT_HSB_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the hospice episode of care record associated with the bereaved.

columns.name: BEREAVEMENT_EPT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient record associated with the bereaved.

columns.name: BEREAVEMENT_CITY
columns.description: The city of the bereavement contact's address.

columns.name: BEREAVEMENT_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The state of the bereavement contact's address.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: BEREAVEMENT_ZIP
columns.description: The zip code of the bereavement contact's address.

columns.name: BEREAVE_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The country of the bereavement contact's address.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: BEREAVEMENT_HPHONE
columns.description: The home phone number for the bereavement contact.

columns.name: BEREAVEMENT_WPHONE
columns.description: The work phone number for the bereavement contact.

columns.name: BEREAVEMENT_MPHONE
columns.description: The mobile phone number for the bereavement contact.

columns.name: BEREAVED_RELATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The relationship of the bereavement contact to the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: BEREAVEMENT_EMAIL
columns.description: The email address for the bereavement contact.

columns.name: BEREAVEMENT_CMNTS
columns.description: Comments entered by the user to record miscellaneous information about the bereaved.

columns.name: SEX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The gender of the bereavement contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Unknown


Nonbinary


X


Other

columns.name: BIRTH_DATE_DT
columns.description: The date of birth of the bereavement contact.

columns.name: PRIMARY_LANGUAGE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The primary language of the bereavement contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: RECORD_CREATION_DT
columns.description: The date the bereavement contact record was created.

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_UPD_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the record was last locked or unlocked.

columns.name: RISK_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Risk level of the bereaved. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Low


Medium


High

columns.name: LAST_ADDRESS_LBL_PRINT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the bereaved address label was last printed.

columns.name: UNLINK_DEPT_ID
columns.description: The department to which the bereaved is linked when not associated with a Home Health or Hospice episode.

columns.name: GENDER_C_NAME
columns.description:
The gender identity of the bereaved.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Transgender Female


Transgender Male


Other


Choose not to disclose

columns.name: COMMBRV_PAT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the individual for whom the bereaved is grieving. This column is only populated for Community Bereavement records. In order to link to patients using non-Community Bereavement records, use the column BEREAVED_INFO.BEREAVEMENT_EPT_ID.

columns.name: COMMBRV_PAT_LEGAL_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The legal sex of the individual for whom the bereaved is grieving. This column is only populated for Community Bereavement records.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SEX_C_NAME

columns.name: COMMBRV_PAT_BIRTH_DATE
columns.description: The date of birth of the individual for whom the bereaved is grieving. This column is only populated for Community Bereavement records.

columns.name: COMMBRV_PAT_DEATH_DATE
columns.description: The date of death of the individual for whom the bereaved is grieving. This column is only populated for Community Bereavement records.

columns.name: COMMBRV_PAT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status (alive, deceased, etc) of the individual for whom the bereaved is grieving. This column is only populated for Community Bereavement records.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Alive


Deceased

columns.name: COMMBRV_PAT_GENDER_C_NAME
columns.description:
The gender identity of the individual for whom the bereaved is grieving. This column is only populated for Community Bereavement records.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: GENDER_C_NAME
